price: Kandi rwose twarokoye bene Isiraheli ibihano bisuzuguza,
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ نَجَّيۡنَا بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ مِنَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ ٱلۡمُهِينِ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: walaqad najjaynā banī is'rāīla mina al-ʿadhābi al-muhīni
